title: How to safely overclock your CPU: A beginners guide to unlock more performance
content:
Overclocking processors — be it Intel or an AMD CPU — is often considered to be the telltale mark of a PC enthusiast. While it’s true that overclocking is no child’s play, it doesn’t pose much of a risk if you know what youâ€™re doing. And in this guide, we’ll teach you how to overclock

The post How to safely overclock your CPU: A beginners guide to unlock more performance appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Here is a beginners guide explaining how you can successfully overclock your CPU, be it Intel or AMD.
